Configuration settings. More...

Defines

#define CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM   1
 En-/disables file system.
#define CONF_WITH_TRANSACTIONS   1
 En-/disables transactions.
#define CONF_WITH_TESTCMDS   1
 En-/disables test commands.
#define CONF_WITH_DELETECMD   1
 En-/disables DELETE.
#define CONF_WITH_CREATECMD   1
 En-/disables CREATE.
#define CONF_WITH_PINAUTH   1
 En-/disables PIN authentication functions.
#define CONF_WITH_PINCMDS   1
 En-/disables PIN commands.
#define CONF_WITH_KEYAUTH   1
 En-/disables key authentication functions.
#define CONF_WITH_KEYCMDS   1
 En-/disables key related commands.
#define CONF_WITH_I2CEEPROM   1
 En-/disables support for the external I2C EEPROM.
#define CONF_WITH_DECRYPT   1
 En-/disables support for decryption.
#define CONF_WITH_LOGGING   1
 En-/disables support for logging.
#define CONF_WITH_RETCODEMGR   0
 En-/disables return code manager.
#define CONF_WITH_FUNNY   0
 En-/disables funny commands.
#define CONF_WITH_TRNG   0
 En-/disables true random generator. Highly experimental!.
#define CONF_WITH_CRYPT_ALGO   0
 Set crypto algorithm.
#define CARD_STATE_ADDR   0x0000
 EEPROM address of the state of the card.
#define ATR_LEN_ADDR   (CARD_STATE_ADDR+1)
 EEPROM address of the ATR length.
#define ATR_MAXLEN   28
 Max. length of the ATR.
#define ATR_ADDR   (ATR_LEN_ADDR+1)
 EEPROM address of the ATR.
#define SERNUM_ADDR   (ATR_ADDR+ATR_MAXLEN)
 EEPROM address of the serial number of the card.
#define SERNUM_LEN   8
 Length of the serial number.
#define RAND_STATE_ADDR   (SERNUM_ADDR+SERNUM_LEN)
 EEPROM address of the state of the PRNG.
#define RAND_STATE_LEN   8+8+16
 Length of the state of the PRNG. (Counter[8], State[8], Key[16]).
#define TRANSAC_STATE_ADDR   (RAND_STATE_ADDR+RAND_STATE_LEN)
 EEPROM address of the transaction state.
#define TRANSAC_DATA_ADDR   (TRANSAC_STATE_ADDR+1)
 EEPROM address of the transaction data.
#define TRANSAC_DATA_LEN   19
 Length of the transaction data.
#define ADM_KEY_LEN   16
 Length of the External Authentication key.
#define INT_KEY_LEN   16
 Length of the Internal Authentication key.
#define PIN_LEN   8
 Length of the PIN.
#define PUK_LEN   8
 Length of the PUK.
#define DATA_END_1   (TRANSAC_DATA_ADDR+TRANSAC_DATA_LEN)
 Dummy address to handle the ifdefs here.
#define FS_START_PTR_ADDR   DATA_END_1
 EEPROM address of pointer to the file system start.
#define ENDIAN_LITTLE
 This is a little endian architecture.
#define EEPROM_SIZE   0x200
 Size of the internal EEPROM.
#define RAM_SIZE   0x200
 Size of the RAM.
#define CHIP   0x01
 Chip ID.
#define ESIZ   0x03
 External EEPROM ID.

 AVR architecture. Needed for assembler.

Detailed Description

Configuration settings.

Id
config.h,v 1.27 2003/03/30 12:42:21 m Exp

Define Documentation

#define ADM_KEY_LEN   16

Length of the External Authentication key.

#define ARCH   avr2

AVR architecture. Needed for assembler.

#define ATR_ADDR   (ATR_LEN_ADDR+1)

EEPROM address of the ATR.

#define ATR_LEN_ADDR   (CARD_STATE_ADDR+1)

EEPROM address of the ATR length.

#define ATR_MAXLEN   28

Max. length of the ATR.

#define CARD_STATE_ADDR   0x0000

EEPROM address of the state of the card.

This is currently unused.

Warning: When using interrupts on the AVR, this byte may accidently be changed. See errata sheets of AVR.

#define CHIP   0x01

Chip ID.

#define CONF_WITH_CREATECMD   1

En-/disables CREATE.

#define CONF_WITH_CRYPT_ALGO   0

Set crypto algorithm.

  • 0: TEA
  • 1: Skipjack
  • 2: NEWDES-SK

#define CONF_WITH_DECRYPT   1

En-/disables support for decryption.

If set to 1, support for decryption side of the cryptographic algorithms are included.

#define CONF_WITH_DELETECMD   1

En-/disables DELETE.

#define CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM   1

En-/disables file system.

Todo:
Make this define something happen.

#define CONF_WITH_FUNNY   0

En-/disables funny commands.

If set to 1, funny commands are included.

#define CONF_WITH_I2CEEPROM   1

En-/disables support for the external I2C EEPROM.

#define CONF_WITH_KEYAUTH   1

En-/disables key authentication functions.

If set to 1, functions impelementing calculations with challenges are included. This is a requirement for CONF_WITH_KEY_CMDS.

#define CONF_WITH_KEYCMDS   1

En-/disables key related commands.

If set to 1, commands EXTERNAL KEYENTIFICATION, GET CHALLENGE, INTERNAL KEYENTIFICATION and VERIFY KEY are included.

#define CONF_WITH_LOGGING   1

En-/disables support for logging.

If set to 1, support for logging is included.

#define CONF_WITH_PINAUTH   1

En-/disables PIN authentication functions.

If set to 1, functions to set and test PIN and PUK are included. This is a requirement for CONF_WITH_PINCMDS.

#define CONF_WITH_PINCMDS   1

En-/disables PIN commands.

If set to 1, commands CHANGE PIN and VERIFY PIN are included.

#define CONF_WITH_RETCODEMGR   0

En-/disables return code manager.

If set to 1, the return code manager is included. This increases code size on the AVR.

#define CONF_WITH_TESTCMDS   1

En-/disables test commands.

If set to 1, commands READ EEPROM and WRITE EEPROM are included.

#define CONF_WITH_TRANSACTIONS   1

En-/disables transactions.

#define CONF_WITH_TRNG   0

En-/disables true random generator. Highly experimental!.

If set to 1, a true random number generator is included. This is currently only for test purposes and highly experimental!

#define DATA_END_1   (TRANSAC_DATA_ADDR+TRANSAC_DATA_LEN)

Dummy address to handle the ifdefs here.

#define EEPROM_SIZE   0x200

Size of the internal EEPROM.

#define ENDIAN_LITTLE

This is a little endian architecture.

#define ESIZ   0x03

External EEPROM ID.

#define FS_START_PTR_ADDR   DATA_END_1

EEPROM address of pointer to the file system start.

#define INT_KEY_LEN   16

Length of the Internal Authentication key.

#define PIN_LEN   8

Length of the PIN.

#define PUK_LEN   8

Length of the PUK.

#define RAM_SIZE   0x200

Size of the RAM.

#define RAND_STATE_ADDR   (SERNUM_ADDR+SERNUM_LEN)

EEPROM address of the state of the PRNG.

#define RAND_STATE_LEN   8+8+16

Length of the state of the PRNG. (Counter[8], State[8], Key[16]).

#define SERNUM_ADDR   (ATR_ADDR+ATR_MAXLEN)

EEPROM address of the serial number of the card.

#define SERNUM_LEN   8

Length of the serial number.

#define TRANSAC_DATA_ADDR   (TRANSAC_STATE_ADDR+1)

EEPROM address of the transaction data.

#define TRANSAC_DATA_LEN   19

Length of the transaction data.

#define TRANSAC_STATE_ADDR   (RAND_STATE_ADDR+RAND_STATE_LEN)

EEPROM address of the transaction state.
